title: Deploy
description: Deploy a page to a specified repository's gh-pages branch.

remote.description: URL for the git remote to deploy to. If not specified, the remote will be determined based off of **this** repository's origin remote.

directory.description: Directory to push to gh-pages. If not specified, the output directory will be determined based off of this project's build target's output path.

remoteName.description: Name of the remote to push to

commitMessage.description: Message of the git commit to gh-pages branch
commitMessage.default: chore: :rocket: deploy new version to Github Pages

baseBranch.description: Base branch to sync the gh-pages branch with

syncWithBaseBranch.description: Indicate if the gh-pages branch should be synced with the base branch

syncStrategy.description: Git command to use to sync the gh-pages branch with the base branch

syncGitOptions.description: Additional git options to use when syncing the gh-pages branch with the base branch

CNAME.description: Custom domain to use for the gh-pages branch. Applied by creating a CNAME file in the root of the gh-pages branch
